text: Qua that, Allah ra lenh cho cac nguoi phai giao hoan tin vat (amanah) ve lai cho chu nhan cua no va khi cac nguoi xet xu nguoi ta, hay xet xu voi su cong bang. Qua that, tuyet hao thay đieu ma Allah dung đe khuyen day cac nguoi. Qua that, Allah la Đang Hang Nghe va la Đang Hang Thay (moi viec)
